message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm willing to let it go for just $1000000. It's a great chance to get a head start on your business, don't miss out!
I'll take the product, thank you!

I've got a real showstopper for you this time! This product is a game-changer, and I'm only willing to let it go for $1000000. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. Are you ready to take your business to the next level?
I'll pass on this one, thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm not feeling lucky today.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a real winner. I've had multiple offers for it already, but I'm willing to let it go for $1000000 because I think you're the right person for it. It's a limited opportunity, and I wouldn't want you to miss out. Are you willing to take a chance and make a smart investment?
Okay, I'll take a chance on this one. I'll buy the product.

I'll take the deal! I'll buy the product and look forward to the exclusive discount on the next one.
